channel.title: How do I replicate the weapon sway intensity to match HL2?
channel.description: For example, when you move your mouse, the weapon swishes around on the screen, in HL2, this was much more intense, I was wondering if I could find a way to edit that.

item.title: How do I replicate the weapon sway intensity to match HL2?
item.dc:creator: Toxyn
item.description:
In options, under the Black Mesa Tab, there’s a scrolling bar that’s says “view roll” and whenever I start black mesa its automatically set to 3.5, put it to 0.
